channel.title: CVE Feed for OneLogin -- Ruby-SAML
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OneLogin -- Ruby-SAML

item.title: CVE-2017-11428|2024-08-05T18:12:39.617Z -- onelogin -- ruby-saml
item.description: OneLogin Ruby-SAML 1.6.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results of XML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attacker may be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating the cryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypass authentication to SAML service providers.
